ComicInfo.Title: Desert Storms part 2; Hard Sell
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Comment: Misty gets tired of Jules' lame innuendos about her chest and freezes him out.
Desert Storms, Part 2: Ajah begins to tutor Patra on life as a harem girl.
Treed: Skyler's attempt to rescue a dog in a tree doesn't go according to plan.
Hard Sell: Two sales people get their sample cases mixed up, causing a salesman to arrive at his sales call with a case full of lingerie rather than insurance brochures.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:16. [Issue ID 200781]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dutch,Dean Lee Norton,Michael Hirtes,Robin Lane,Kurt Wilcken
